channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: DotCIO announcing Microsoft Windows 10 support ends on 10/14/2025
item.description: Microsoft Windows 10 support ends on October 14th, 2025. This means that as of this date, most Windows 10 systems will cease to be eligible for support including important security patches. Without appropriate mitigation, Windows 10 systems will be non-compliant with multiple RPI security policies and may be denied access to the campus network in order to reduce risk and maintain a secure cybersecurity posture.
item.author: Community

item.title: Coffee & Conversations | Aug.Â 7
item.description:
Date: Thursday, August 7, 2025 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM - Students are invited to stop by for a cup of coffee, a little treat and an opportunity to socially connect with peers!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
